hero.subtitle: We identify the deals, manage the contractors, and handle the sale. You provide the capital and collect the profit. Experience hands-free real estate investing.

journey.title: The Journey: We Manage, You Profit

steps.title: AI Assessment & Acquisition
steps.description: Our proprietary AI algorithms scan thousands of listings to identify undervalued properties with specific renovation potential. We lock down the deal before it hits the mass market.

steps.title: Expert Renovation Management
steps.description: No late night calls from contractors. We handle all permits, materials, and construction management using our vetted network of partners to force appreciation quickly.

steps.title: Profit Distribution
steps.description: Once the renovation is complete, the property is sold or refinanced. The initial capital is returned, and the net profits are split transparently.

valueStrategies.title: Value-Add Strategies
valueStrategies.subtitle: Our playbook focuses on high-ROI improvements that modern buyers demand, ensuring maximum returns for your investment.

items.title: Cosmetic Lift
items.description: Paint, flooring, and fixtures. Low cost, high impact updates that transform look and feel, significantly increasing appeal and market value.

items.title: ADU Addition
items.description: Adding Accessory Dwelling Units to increase square footage and rental income potential, unlocking new revenue streams and boosting property value.

items.title: Smart Home Tech
items.description: Integration of smart thermostats, security, and lighting to appeal to tech-savvy buyers, enhancing convenience and modern living standards.

items.title: Energy Efficiency
items.description: Window replacements, insulation upgrades, and solar readiness to reduce long-term costs, appealing to environmentally conscious buyers and renters.

profitStructure.title: Transparent Profit Structure
profitStructure.description: We believe in aligning incentives. We only make money when you make money. Our profit-sharing model creates a true partnership where we handle the heavy lifting.

benefits.title: 100% Capital Return First
benefits.description: Your initial investment is returned in full before any profits are split.

benefits.title: 80/20 Profit Split
benefits.description: Investors keep 80% of the net profit. We take 20% as a performance fee.

benefits.title: No Hidden Management Fees
benefits.description: We don't charge monthly asset management fees that eat into your returns.

items.quote: I had the capital but zero time to manage a reno. AI PropInvest handled everything. The reporting was transparent and the payout was exactly as predicted. Truly passive income!
items.name: Sarah Jenkins

items.quote: Their value-add strategy for adding an ADU was brilliant. It increased the property value significantly more than a standard cosmetic flip. Impressed with the foresight.
items.name: Michael Chen

items.quote: Professional from start to finish. The AI assessment was spot on regarding the neighborhood appreciation. Highly recommend to anyone looking for hands-off investment growth.
items.name: Elena Rodriguez

leadForm.title: Ready to start your profit journey?
leadForm.subtitle: Join our exclusive list of partners. We only take on 10 new investors per month to ensure quality control and maximum attention.
leadForm.disclaimer: By submitting this form, you agree to our terms. Your information is secure.
